import React, { useState } from "react"; import logo from "../images/OguzhanAirline.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; return ( <>
